Literature.Title: Myticalins: A Novel Multigenic Family of Linear, Cationic Antimicrobial Peptides from Marine Mussels (Mytilus spp.)
Literature.Author: Leoni G, De Poli A, Mardirossian M, Gambato S, Florian F, Venier P, Wilson DN, Tossi A, Pallavicini A, Gerdol M

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=4µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=32µM),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 19606(MIC=2µM),Vibrio anguillarum ATCC 43305(MIC=>32µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=8µM),Bacillus subtilis ATCC 6051(MIC=32µM)
